blueprint.description: Installs the Bitwarden CLI on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Bitwarden CLI](https://github.com/bitwarden/cli) (i.e. bw) is a free and open-source official CLI for the [Bitwarden](https://bitwarden.com/) password manager. bw is available on Linux, macOS, and Microsoft Windows.
blueprint.name: Bitwarden CLI
blueprint.title: Bitwarden CLI
